arts.ttl: Initial reaction from Des Buckingham after U’s hold Clarets to draw
arts.sum: DES Buckingham was proud of how his Oxford United side dealt with the game out of possession in their goalless draw at home to Burnley.

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Oxford United as six 7/10s and two 5/10s dished out - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley were held to a frustrating goalless draw against Oxford United despite a dominant display at the Kassam Stadium.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction as Burnley are held to a frustrating goalless draw against Oxford United
arts.sum: Scott Parker refused to be too downbeat despite Burnley’s failure to turn their dominance against Oxford United into three points.

arts.ttl: Oxford United 0-0 Burnley: Frustrated Clarets fail to make dominance pay as winning run comes to an end
arts.sum: Burnley failed to make it three wins from three as they were held to a frustrating goalless draw against Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Oxford United earn first draw of Championship season at home to Burnley
arts.sum: It took until shortly before the midway point of the opening 45 minutes for the first sight of goal, as Luca Koleosho got down the right-hand side and squared the ball for Lyle Foster, who fired well off target with a first-time effort. Burnley came knocking again when a sloppy square pass from Nelson close to the halfway line led to a dangerous counter-attack, resulting in left winger Jeremy Sarmiento forcing a corner at Jamie Cumming’s near post.

arts.ttl: Oxford hold Burnley to goalless draw
arts.sum: United are unbeaten at home this season.

arts.ttl: 25 images of Burnley fans arriving at the Kassam Stadium for Championship fixture against Oxford United
arts.sum: Burnley fans have arrived at the Kassam Stadium for the Championship fixture against Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Burnley dealt Joe Worrall blow as Scott Parker makes two changes for Oxford United test
arts.sum: Scott Parker has made two changes to his Burnley side to take on Oxford United, with Joe Worrall a surprise absentee.

arts.ttl: UPDATES: Oxford United v Burnley – live
arts.sum: All the build-up, action and reaction as Oxford United welcome Burnley in their first game against one of last season’s relegated Premier League sides. Oxford United (10th) v Burnley (3rd) Comment below or tweet @OxfordMailOUFC to get involved.

arts.ttl: Kyle Edwards on why U’s were the only club he was going to sign for after injury woes
arts.sum: AFTER the support shown to him, Kyle Edwards didn’t consider anyone else but Oxford United once he returned to fitness.
